@id.description: name that identifies a unique object

name.description: name that identifies the name of the bus-stop

addr:city.description: name identifying the name of the city where the bus stop is located

addr:postcode.description: number identifying the postcode of the city where the bus stop is located

addr:street.description: name identifying the name of the street where the bus stop is located

coordinates.description: array the points which compose the polygon
